lines.text: Gary dreams about kissing someone so hard his mouth hurts. He dreams about kissing someone so soft his heart hurts, so long his neck hurts, so deep his throat hurts. Gary dreams about kissing someone so... completely that nothing hurts.
You spent all the money on junk food? Y'know, some of that was rent money.
I thought we paid that last month.
I don't wanna live without you guys. And now I don't wanna die without you.
One sees the doughnut, the other the hole.
I'm sorry, but I wasn't listening. Does that mean I'm going to die too?
